examples: A veterinarian could delouse your dog.

definitions.definition: To apply insecticides or insect repellents to, in order to be sure that no lice or other parasites are present .
examples: During the Korean Conflict, American soldiers were deloused with DDT upon entering basic training.

definitions.definition: To remove malicious software , such as viruses , trojans , spyware , or worms , from.
examples: A deloused computer may still be considered no longer trustworthy.

secondary_definitions: To apply insecticides or insect repellents to, in order to be sure that no lice or other parasites are present .
( computing , transitive ) To remove malicious software , such as viruses , trojans , spyware , or worms , from.
